entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
